name: Hobgoblin Captain
description: The Hobgoblin Captain is a formidable Medium humanoid creature, skilled in both physical combat and leadership, commanding fire and tactical movements on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to inspire allies and provide tactical advantages makes it a notable threat.
goals: To lead and enhance the effectiveness of hobgoblin forces in combat.
relations: Often encountered with other hobgoblins as part of a military unit.
environment: Typically found in military camps or areas of conflict.
strengths: Possesses strong physical attributes and the ability to command and inspire.
weaknesses: Combat effectiveness may diminish without allies nearby.
attacks: Can execute a Multiattack with a greatsword and throw javelins, dealing significant slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Officers Command allows it to inspire nearby allies, significantly boosting their combat effectiveness.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Engineering, Intimidation, and has a decent perception skill.
additional_information: Formation Movement prevents provoking opportunity attacks from allies.
Strong leadership role in hobgoblin military structure.
Access to strategic abilities enhancing ally effectiveness.
Uses both melee and ranged attack options.
